questions.question: What is the purpose of the HTML5 'semantic' elements?
options: To provide meaning to the webpage structure
To make the webpage look better
questions.answer: To provide meaning to the webpage structure

questions.question: What is the purpose of the <meta> tag in HTML?

To define a section in the document
questions.answer: To provide metadata about the HTML document
